mapper.select: select USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, RIGHTS, ROLE_ID, LAST_LOGIN, IP, STATUS, BZ, PHONE, SFID, START_TIME, END_TIME, YEARS from SYS_APP_USER where USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
select USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, RIGHTS, ROLE_ID, LAST_LOGIN, IP, STATUS, BZ, PHONE, SFID, START_TIME, END_TIME, YEARS from SYS_APP_USER where USERNAME = #{USERNAME}
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_APP_USER ( USER_ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, RIGHTS, ROLE_ID, LAST_LOGIN, IP, STATUS, BZ, PHONE, SFID, START_TIME, END_TIME, YEARS ) values ( #{USER_ID}, #{USERNAME}, #{PASSWORD}, #{NAME}, #{RIGHTS}, #{ROLE_ID}, #{LAST_LOGIN}, #{IP}, #{STATUS}, #{BZ}, #{PHONE}, #{SFID}, #{START_TIME}, #{END_TIME}, #{YEARS} )
